title: Field Buffs
paragraph: Fields outside of the starter can have buff assigned to them. Field buffs are permanent and stay until the end of the world.

chapters.subtitle: Buff Types
chapters.paragraph:
Attack boost 
 Defense boost 
 Mining boost 
 Recruiting boost

chapters.subtitle: Buff Chance
chapters.paragraph: A field has a 5/16 chance to have one buff and a 1/16 change to have two buffs. Portals can't have any buffs.

chapters.subtitle: Buff Strength
chapters.paragraph:
Not every buff is equally strong. There are three strength categories, one start, two starts and three stars. The more stars the stronger the buff. The strength of the buff has been randomly generated. Buffs with high strength's are much rarer. 

 Strength range: 
 Attack: 10% - 600% 
 Defense: 8% - 480% 
 Recruiting: 10% - 600% 
 Mining: 25% - 1500%
